pullrequest.title: Add design doc for converting protobuf messages to sdformat objects

content.raw: It looks good to me. The only problem that I see is that it does not look trivial to write a generic converter from protobuf to sdf and we have more than 100 different protobuf message types. It's going to be a little tedious.
content.html: It looks good to me. The only problem that I see is that it does not look trivial to write a generic converter from protobuf to sdf and we have more than 100 different protobuf message types. It's going to be a little tedious.
